job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstronguPosition DescriptionustrongppAre you a passionate talented software engineer who has experience building innovation missioncritical highimpact solutions Come build the future of rehabilitation with our team and make a positive impact by developing technology designed to help people recovering from paralysis walk againppbrppWe are now hiring a software developer to join our growing engineering team You will play a pivotal role in shaping the definition vision design and roadmap to invent and innovate new technologies solve highly complex problems at scale and deliver gamechanging products and servicesppbrppThis position will have the opportunity to work at the intersection of electrical hardware to frontend development on a number of new technologies You will design and implement critical features at the intersection of electrical hardware and software frontend backend andor fullstack interfacessystems for consumers depending on the project Your standards of the software built will be high since it has the potential to be extended for multiple use cases and most importantly will have interaction from individuals in a healthcare AreustrongnbspppHealing Innovations is a medical technology company focused on improving care within the rehabilitation continuum Our mission is to increase access to rehabilitation through the development and commercialization of marketleading robotic technology that helps people improve health mobility and independence Healing Innovations offers advanced robotic technology software and services to care settings throughout the rehabilitation continuum Healing Innovations was named the 2021 Tech Startup of the Year by the Nashville Technology Councilp
